translation.en: No. [sighing] Totally boring.
Boring.
Speak for yourself, Lucy. I'd call it intriguing.
translation.fr: Parle pour toi, Lucy.Je trouve ça intrigant.

translation.en: -I mean-- -Be quiet.
Yep. Boring. So boring.
Ugh, bummer. I was looking for something fun to do after school today.
See ya.
A talking crow is so not boring.
translation.fr: Un corbeau parlant n'est pas ennuyeux.

translation.en: Hey, Willa. What are you doing here?
Hey, Dad. Just wanted to let you know I'm going to be late today.
translation.fr: Papa, j'aurai une heure de retard.

translation.en: -I'm going to tea with, um, uh-- -Oh, okay, Willa. [chuckles]
translation.fr: - Je vais prendre le thé…- D'accord, Willa.

translation.en: Hey, little guy. I'll see you at dinner, right?
translation.fr: Hé, petit gars ! On se voit au dîner ?

translation.en: -[Willa] Okay, bye. -Don't worry, they're just eyeballs.
translation.fr: - Salut.- C'est pas grave. C'est rien, ce ne sont que des yeux.

translation.en: Ready?
Why are we taking the spookiest possible route to get there?
translation.fr: Pourquoi prendrele chemin le plus effrayant ?

translation.en: You know, the legend says these woods are the Haunted Hills,
translation.fr: La légende dit que ces bois sontdes collines hantées,

translation.en: cursed by the three witches of Winding Way themselves.
translation.fr: maudites par les trois sorcièresde Winding Way.

translation.en: I heard that witches have lived in that old house for centuries.
translation.fr: On dit que les sorcières viventdans cette maison depuis des siècles.

translation.en: Well, it's a good thing we're brave, right?
Come on. None of that is real.
translation.fr: Allez. Rien de tout ça n'est vrai.

translation.en: -Besides, this isn't that spooky. -Yeah.
translation.fr: - En plus, ce n'est pas si effrayant.- Oui.

translation.en: [Willa] They're probably just old ladies
translation.fr: Ce sont sûrement de vieilles dames

translation.en: who happen to live in a really creepy old house.
translation.fr: qui viventdans une vieille maison flippante.

translation.en: Just that right there sounded like the setup for a spooky movie.
translation.fr: On se serait cruesdans un film d'horreur, là.

translation.en: [hesitant] Yeah. What could go wrong?
Famous last words.
[Scout] Defs the beginning of a spooky movie.
translation.fr: Ça fait vraiment début de film d'horreur.

translation.en: Well, no time like the present.
translation.fr: On reste les pieds sur terre.

translation.en: -Hello? -[soft music plays]
Hello?
Is anyone home?
I hope you don't mind. I brought my friends.
translation.fr: Ça ne vous dérange pas ? J'ai amené des amies.

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Willa! So nice to see you again.
Again?
We knew you when you were just a baby.
translation.fr: On t'a connue toute bébé.Toute mignonne. Avec la peau,

translation.en: Oh, such a cute baby, with the skin, and the teeth, and the hairs, and things.
translation.fr: On t'a connue toute bébé.Toute mignonne. Avec la peau, les dents, les cheveux et tout.

translation.en: [Wilma] And Lucy, Scout.
-Welcome. -[chuckles]
How did you know…?
Oh, just a simple seeing spell, nothing fancy.
translation.fr: Un simple sortilègede seconde vue, rien de plus.

translation.en: -Spell? -Ix-nay on the agic-may.
translation.fr: - Un sortilège ?- Chut sur la magie.

translation.en: Please, sit down.
So, you knew my mom?
Oh! Knew her? [laughs]
Knew her? [laughs]
She was, uh, we were like…
translation.fr: Elle était… On était comme ça.

translation.en: That. We were best friends. We were just real close.
-You couldn't keep the three of us apart. -[Wanda laughs]
Well, until Neil-- [shrieks, laughs]
Until nothing. Until nothing. [strained laughter]
She was a real sweetheart, you know, heart of gold.
translation.fr: Elle était adorable, un cœur en or.

translation.en: [laughs] Don't be shy.
[chuckling] Well, this isn't much of a tea party, is it?
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas vraiment un goûter, hein ?

translation.en: [laughs] Kidding. No, because there are no treats, and, um, no tea.
translation.fr: Je plaisante.Non, il n'y a ni friandises ni thé.

translation.en: But I can change that, so I'm going to. Alright? [laughs]
translation.fr: Mais je peux changer ça. Allez. D'accord ?

translation.en: -[gasping] -Amazing.
What are you doing?
[strained] You know that children love candy, so just play along.
translation.fr: Les enfants adorent les bonbons,alors joue le jeu.

translation.en: -What's happening? -Now what is happening? [laughs]
-[Wanda chuckles] -Isn't this fun?
So much-- [gags]
So much fun. [laughs]
Now Scout: what is your favorite treat in the whole wide world?
translation.fr: Scat, quel est ton plat préféréd'entre tous les plats ?

translation.en: Cotton candy. Cotton candy. [gags]
translation.fr: - La barbe à papa !- La barbe à papa.

translation.en: Yum.
Edible chair? What? This might be the best day of my life.
translation.fr: Une chaise comestible ? Quoi ?C'est le meilleur jour de ma vie.

translation.en: Lucy, what would you like to have at tea for three?
translation.fr: Lucy ! Que prendras-tu avec ton thé au goûter ?

translation.en: Well, I've always dreamed of it raining chocolate.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours rêvéd'une pluie de chocolat.

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Wanda] Oh, no.
-[Willa] Delicious! -[Lucy] Whoa!
Now Willa, what about you, my dear? I want to know about my mom,
translation.fr: - Willa, à toi, ma chérie.- Je veux en savoir plus sur ma mère.

translation.en: so maybe we could have more talk, less treats.
translation.fr: Alors, on pourrait plus parler et moins manger.

translation.en: -Willa, are you crazy? -Speak for yourself.
translation.fr: - Willa, tu es folle ?- Parle pour toi !

translation.en: She's here. What are we waiting for?
translation.fr: Elle est là. Qu'est-ce qu'on attend ?

translation.en: Let's get that thing off her.
Well, um, you know, maybe we should just give them a moment to enjoy the tea party,
translation.fr: On devrait leur laisser le tempsde profiter du thé

translation.en: for-for a moment.
Fink, Sneak, shut up!
Wait a second. That's that rat from last night.
translation.fr: Attendez ! C'est le rat d'hier soir.

translation.en: [gasps] Uh, I think we should go.
-No. -[ominous music plays]
[laughs] Let's cut to the chase, shall we?
We want your necklace.
I know it would be nice for you to have it, but what good is it to you, really?
translation.fr: Je sais que tu l'aimes bien,mais à quoi il te sert ?

translation.en: I mean, whereas to us, getting it back would be, I don't know, Wilma, what would you say?
translation.fr: Pour nous, le récupérer serait,je ne sais pas, Willma, je dirais,

translation.en: Like, um, magnificently splendorifically terrifical?
-Yes, I'd say exactly that. -Mm-hm.
No. It was my mom's and she wanted me to have it.
translation.fr: Non ! Il était à ma mèreet elle voulait que je l'aie.

translation.en: You invited me here to tell me about her, and I haven't heard one thing.
translation.fr: Vous m'avez invitéepour me parler d'elle, et rien.

translation.en: So, we're leaving.
Uh, no you're not.
Sneak.
Aw, that's a shame, because there was an easy way to do this,
translation.fr: C'est dommage, car tu pouvaist'en défaire à la manière douce,

translation.en: and now, [laughs] what do you know, there's a hard way.
translation.fr: mais non, ça va être à la manière forte.

translation.en: I mean, we didn't want to have to play the witch card, but you've kind of forced our hands.
translation.fr: On ne voulait pas faire de sorcellerie,mais tu nous y obliges.

translation.en: -[cackling] -Witches! [screams]
See? I told you those stories are true.
translation.fr: Tu vois ? Les histoires sont vraies.

translation.en: You want to know something about your mom?
translation.fr: Tu veux savoir quelque chose sur ta mère ?

translation.en: She was too trusting.
Just. Like. You.
-Over here! -[screaming]
-Oh, no. Um, here. Hide. -[Wanda] It's time! Witches coming for ya!
translation.fr: - Non !- Arrêtez ! Là, cachez-vous ! Les sorcières arrivent !

translation.en: [Wilma, singsongy] We just want to talk to you.
[whimpers] They're coming.
[Willa] Hide. In here.
-[ominous music plays] -[singsongy] Girls! Where did you go?
-[cackling] -You can run, but you can't hide.
translation.fr: Fuyez, mais on va vous trouver !

translation.en: This way.
Some kind of potion room.
translation.fr: C'est une sorte de salle des potions.

translation.en: I'm calling my mom. I don't care if I get grounded--
translation.fr: J'appelle ma mère !Je me fiche d'être punie pour toujours.

translation.en: Forever. There's no signal.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de réseau.

translation.en: Lucy, your face feels more bony than usual.
translation.fr: Lucy, ton visage est très osseux, là.

translation.en: -You're not touching my face, Scout. -Sure I am.
translation.fr: - Tu ne me touches pas, Scat.- Mais si.

translation.en: That's your cheek, and now I'm sticking my finger into your eye--
translation.fr: Là, c'est ta joue, et là,je te mets le doigt dans l'œil.

translation.en: [Scout] Into your eye?!
-[Wilma] Oh, girls? -[gasps] Oh no.
[screams] Find a potion!
-Do something! -[wails]
Nope. Upside down potion.
Flying potion.
Hiding potion! Aha!
Here.
"When ye wish to hide From the troubles on the outside
translation.fr: "Quand vous voulez éviterles ennuis qui pointent leur nez,

translation.en: Drink this potion with open mind And ye shall be the… feline kind?"
translation.fr: "buvez cette potion sans tarder,pour avoir du félin la majesté ?"

translation.en: Wait. Does that mean…?
-[tinkling] -Oh no.
-You're-- -I have paws.
Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no.
And a tail!
[Wilma] Yoo-hoo! Girls.
Run!
Run? I have to learn to walk with four legs before I can run!
translation.fr: Courir ? Je dois apprendreà marcher à quatre pattes avant.

translation.en: [Wanda] I won't let them get away.
translation.fr: Je ne les laisserai pas filer !

translation.en: -[Wanda] Where did they get to now? -[Wilma] Sure are slimy little things.
translation.fr: Où sont-elles passées ? Les sales petites pestes.

translation.en: -[Willa] Quick. Under here. -[dramatic music plays]
I've looked everywhere. They're gone.
And I looked everywhere you looked right after you did, just to be sure.
translation.fr: J'ai regardé partoutoù tu as regardé juste pour vérifier.

translation.en: You know how cats can fit into the smallest places?
translation.fr: Vous savezcomme les chats se faufilent partout ?

translation.en: You want us to go in there? Look at the size of that spider.
translation.fr: - Tu veux qu'on aille là-dedans ?- Regarde cette araignée !

translation.en: [scoffs] I'll stay here and meet my fate, thank you very much.
translation.fr: Je vais rester iciet rencontrer mon destin, merci.

translation.en: [Willa] Shoo, you big, hairy spider. We're coming in.
[Scout] Come on, Lucy. We don't have time to be scared.
translation.fr: Allez, Lucy. Pas le temps pour avoir peur.

translation.en: [witches scream] Where are they?
[gasps] A tail.
A tail. [gasps] That means they've gotten into the hiding potion.
translation.fr: Une queue. Elles ont prisde la potion de camouflage.

translation.en: -[gasps] -We need to go outside! We need Claw!
translation.fr: On doit sortir. Où est Noireaud ?

translation.en: -Claw! -Claw!
[Willa] We have to keep moving. We cannot be scaredy cats.
translation.fr: On doit continuer. Il ne faut pas avoir peur.

translation.en: I am a scaredy cat, though.
translation.fr: Je suis un chat et j'ai peur.

translation.en: Claw!
-Oh, hey! How's the party going? -They snuck out in the drain.
translation.fr: Alors, la fête se passe bien ? Elles se sont échappées.Dis-nous immédiatement si tu les vois.

translation.en: Let us know immediately if you see them, okay?
translation.fr: Elles se sont échappées.Dis-nous immédiatement si tu les vois.

translation.en: -Uh… sure? -Do not let them get away.
translation.fr: - Ne les…- D'accord. … perds pas. À vol d'oiseau,elles sont ne sont pas loin.

translation.en: As the crow flies, they can't have gone far.
translation.fr: … perds pas. À vol d'oiseau,elles sont ne sont pas loin.

translation.en: You're a crow, so you should know. Okay, stop looking at me.
translation.fr: Tu es un corbeau, tu le sais.Ne me fais pas ces yeux.

translation.en: -[caws] -Fly!
-Yes. Wilma? -Yes?
Warm up the cauldron.
Now?
Yes, Wilma, now.
Cat respect meter just went way up.
That was so claustrophobic.
And filthy. Ew.
-[dramatic music plays] -Here, kitties, kitties, kitties!
Well, I spy with my little crow eye… [caws]
translation.fr: Jacques a dit avec mon œil de corbeau…

translation.en: It's that creepy crow!
Shoo! Go away! Leave us alone!
[caws] Not until you hand over the amulet.
Run!
-[bubbling] -[Wanda] Yes, yes, yes…
Oh yes, oh yes!
Claw's got them. Wilma! Claw's got them!
translation.fr: Noireaud les tient. Willma ! Noireaud les tient.

translation.en: We got 'em!
Fog and bog and city smog And nice little families out for a jog
translation.fr: Brouillard, marais et nuages,faites entrave à tout voyage,

translation.en: Envelop the children who are now cats And, oh, they'll be scared like, like rats
translation.fr: enveloppez les filles en forme de chatspour les coincer comme des rats. Oui ?

translation.en: [high-pitched] Meow! It's foggy, I can't see. [normal voice] It's really working, Wilma, it's working!
translation.fr: "On voit rien dans la brume."Ça marche, Willma !

translation.en: [Willa] What is this place?
Super creepy, that's what.
In case we don't make it back, I just want to say
translation.fr: Au cas où on ne reviendrait pas,je tiens à dire

translation.en: that I was 100% right about the witches this whole time.
translation.fr: que j'avais complètement raisonpour les sorcières !

translation.en: Where's all this fog coming from? I can't see my paws in front of my face!
translation.fr: D'où vient ce brouillard ?Je vois à peine où je mets mes pattes.

translation.en: This is so not fun anymore.
Honestly, it really hasn't been fun since the candy part,
translation.fr: À vrai dire, ça ne l'est plus depuis les bonbons.

translation.en: and even that felt a tad unsanitary.
translation.fr: Et même ça, c'était un peu malsain.

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Hello, girls.
Nice work, Claw.
An extra portion of kitten stew just for you!
translation.fr: Tu auras un supplémentde ragoût de chaton.

translation.en: Aha! Hello, kitten stew. [caws]
One thing you three might have overlooked.
translation.fr: Une chose que vous avez négligée,

translation.en: [Wilma] Witches love eating cat stew! Especially on a stormy night.
translation.fr: c'est que les sorcières adorent le ragoûtde chat, surtout par mauvais temps.

translation.en: Eat someone else then, because we're out of here.
translation.fr: Mange quelqu'un d'autre,parce qu'on s'en va. Fuyez !

translation.en: -[Willa] Run! -[Lucy] I am not a snack.
translation.fr: Mange quelqu'un d'autre,parce qu'on s'en va. Fuyez ! Je ne suis pas à manger !

translation.en: [groans] I forgot how slippery cats are.
translation.fr: J'oubliais à quel pointles chats sont agiles.

translation.en: But not how tasty.
-[Wilma] Whoo! -[Wanda] You go that way.
-[Wilma exhales, clicks tongue] -Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no.
[sighs] Where could they be?
Don't move a whisker.
Oh, no, guys. I have to…
-Please don't sneeze. -[Lucy makes pre-sneeze noises]
-[pre-sneeze noises] -[Willa] Please, please hold it in.
[Willa] Hold it in.
-Bless you. -Thanks.
-We need to get out of here. -Now's our chance.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on fuie. C'est le moment.

translation.en: Lucy, wait!
Not so fast this time.
Now the hiding's said and done Return the form that they came from
translation.fr: La clandestinité est dissipée,retrouvez la forme que vous aviez !

translation.en: We're human again. We're human!
translation.fr: On est humaines ! On est humaines.

translation.en: -Hey, hi. -Yes! Still dangerous witches, not so happy.
translation.fr: On est toujours dangereuses,ne vous réjouissez pas.

translation.en: Looks like you girls have been rooted out.
translation.fr: On dirait que vous avez été débusquées.

translation.en: And it's going to be a lot harder for you to escape
translation.fr: Vous allez avoir plus de mal à fuir

translation.en: now that you're just "pesky little girls" and not cats.
translation.fr: en simples petites pestes,et plus en chats.

translation.en: Oh, I have an idea. Why don't we call this whole thing off,
translation.fr: J'ai une idée.Réglons ça une fois pour toutes.

translation.en: and you just, I don't know, hand over the necklace. Just grab it.
translation.fr: - Donne le collier, par exemple ?- Prends-le !

translation.en: You know as well as I do, it needs to be given, not taken.
translation.fr: Tu sais bienqu'il doit être donné, pas pris.

translation.en: Well, in that case, hand over the amulet. Now!
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, donne l'amulette. Vite !

translation.en: No! My mom would never want it in the hands of you bad witches.
translation.fr: Non ! Ma mère ne voudrait pasqu'il soit à de mauvaises sorcières.

translation.en: -I'm gonna get my dad and he'll-- -[laughing]
translation.fr: Je vais chercher mon père et il…

translation.en: Did you hear that, Wilma? She's going to get "Neil" to come help.
translation.fr: Tu as entendu, Willma ?Elle va chercher Neil à l'aide.

translation.en: -[Wanda] Neil! -[laughing]
My mom was right. Chocolate alleviates stress.
translation.fr: Ma mère a raison. Le chocolat déstresse.

translation.en: Good thing I loaded up at the tea party. Seriously? You're eating candy right now?
translation.fr: - J'ai fait des réserves au goûter.- Tu manges des bonbons maintenant ?

translation.en: Candy? [gags]
The candy!
They can't stand candy. Literally!
Take that!
Let's get out of here, fast.
-Ooh! Oh no. Burning! -[Wilma whimpers, yelps]
-[screams] Stop! -[dramatic music plays]
We made it.
-[Scout] Oh my goodness. -Hey! Alright, I got a signal!
translation.fr: Oh, mon Dieu. Hé ! J'ai du réseau !

translation.en: Oh, good.
Okay, I am so grounded.
So much for those stories being made up, huh, Scout?
I mean, no 11-year-old really believes in witches.
translation.fr: Aucun enfant de 11 ans ne croitvraiment aux sorcières.

translation.en: How was I supposed to know?
I have a feeling that's not the last we'll be seeing of those two. [sighs]
translation.fr: Je crois que ce n'est pasla dernière fois qu'on les voit.

translation.en: As scary as tonight was, it was also pretty cool to be a cat.
translation.fr: On a eu peur ce soir, mais c'était cool d'être un chat.

translation.en: -[soft music plays] -Think we can do it again? [in unison] Seriously?
-Too soon? -[in unison] Yes!
And there's no way I'm going back into that house to get more potion. Except…
translation.fr: Et je ne retournerai pas dans cette maisonchercher la potion. Sauf…

translation.en: Wait a second. I forgot to put it back on the shelf.
translation.fr: Attendez. J'ai oublié de la reposer.

translation.en: I think seventh grade just got a lot more interesting.
translation.fr: Je pense que la 5e va devenirbien plus intéressante.

translation.en: Hey, guys? Thanks for being such great friends today and sticking by me.
translation.fr: Merci d'être de si bonnes amieset de ne pas m'avoir lâchée.

translation.en: You guys are like the sisters I never had. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Vous êtes les sœursque je n'ai jamais eues.

translation.en: [in a spooky voice] The Sisters of Winding Way! Whoo…
-[laughing] -Wisters!
The Wisters of Winding Way! [laughing]
-The Wisters! -[Willa] Come on.
Heyo.
Dad!
What would you say if I told you I got chased by witches today
translation.fr: Tu sais que j'ai été pourchasséepar ces sorcières

translation.en: and turned into a cat?
translation.fr: et que je suis devenu un chat ?

translation.en: [inhales] Well I would say, sweetheart, you don't have to make up stories to get my attention.
translation.fr: Ma chérie, tu n'as pas à inventerdes histoires pour attirer mon attention.

translation.en: You always have my attention.
Thought it would be something like that.
translation.fr: Je savais que tu dirais ça.

translation.en: -[soft music plays] -Do you know where Mom got this?
translation.fr: Tu sais où maman l'a trouvé ?

translation.en: No. She just always had it, ever since I knew her.
translation.fr: Non. Je l'ai toujours vue avec.

translation.en: She used to say she was a different person before she and I met and we had you.
translation.fr: Elle disait avoir changé de vieavec notre rencontre et ta naissance.

translation.en: Maybe she got it from one of the [spooky voice] witches of Winding Way.
translation.fr: Peut-être qu'elle l'a eued'une des sorcières de Winding Way.

translation.en: Bedtime.
You want the lights on or off?
On.
Okay. Love you, kiddo.
What?
"Dear Willa." "If you're reading this, that means you have my necklace,
translation.fr: "Chère Willa. Si tu lis ceci,c'est que tu as mon collier.

translation.en: and I think you're probably wondering if I was a witch."
translation.fr: "Je pense que tu te demandessi j'étais une sorcière.

translation.en: "I was."
[Willow] I was a witch, Willa.
[sighs] And if I know my curious…
pure-hearted, beautiful baby girl…
translation.fr: petite fille curieuse et au cœur pur…

translation.en: …I know what you're thinking. [exhales]
translation.fr: Je sais ce que tu te dis.

translation.en: "How could my mom be a witch, and does this make me a witch too?"
translation.fr: "Si ma mère était une sorcière,ça fait de moi une sorcière ?"

translation.en: Just because you are mine…
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas parce que tu es ma fille…

translation.en: "…doesn't make you a witch."
"Believing in magic does, and you can be a witch."
translation.fr: "il faut croire en la magie. "Là, tu en seras une."

translation.en: A good witch,
if you choose to believe in the values of courage,
translation.fr: si tu crois aux valeurs de courage,

translation.en: kindness, and wisdom.
"Magic can be used for bad things,
translation.fr: "La magie peut être employéeà mauvais escient.

translation.en: but it can also be used for very, very good things."
translation.fr: "Mais on peut l'utiliserpour faire beaucoup de bien."

translation.en: You taught me that, Willa.
And now that you have my necklace, you have that choice.
translation.fr: Et maintenant que tu as mon collier, tu as le choix.

translation.en: There is something very important you must do, though.
translation.fr: J'ai quelque chosede très important à te dire.

translation.en: "In order to harness the power of the amulet,
and keep yourself safe…"
…you will need my secret witch book.
translation.fr: … il te faudra mon grimoire secret.

translation.en: I hid it for you in case this day ever came.
translation.fr: Je l'ai caché pour toien prévision de ce jour.

translation.en: There will be obstacles along the way to finding it…
translation.fr: Il y aura des obstacles pour le trouver…

translation.en: "…to make sure it ends up in the right hands."
Your hands. [sighs]
I love you…
with all that I am.
"And I am always with you."
Closer than you know.
[crying] "Take good care of Dad."
[voice breaking] You are my heart.
"Mom."
